title.rendered: STEDI NUMBER PLATE LIGHT MOUNTING BRACKET

content.rendered:
Satin Black Number Plate Driving Light Mounting Bracket

(LED Light Bar Sold Separately)

OVERVIEW

While most think that LED Driving Lights are only catering for the 4×4 community out there, you might be suprised to find that this bracket breaks down that wall. As most everyday road users don’t won’t the obscure LED bar across the roof and prefer something a little more sleek and clean.

FITTING

Will fit almost all factory front bumpers sizing just a little wider than your license plate to maintain the factory feel to your vehicle.

APPLICATION

The STEDI Number Plate bracket runs no shortage of compatibility to LED Light Bars & Driving Lights through our range. We have listed the 3 most popular LED Light Bars that customers opt for when purchasing the Number Plate Bracket. These are available through the drop down menu near the add to cart.

DETAILS

The STEDI Hardened Steel Number Plate light mounting brackets bolt through your existing number plate holes, for effortlessly mounting driving lights or and LED Light Bar.

Finished in a durable satin black UV stabilised powder coat, along with contoured  tube section, makes for an aesthetically pleasing addition to any passenger vehicle.

Great solution if you need to install Spot Light or a LED Light Bar but do not have a nudge bar or bull bar to mount to.  Universal fitment, with no modification required.

Fits most lights with adjustable bottom slide brackets.

Also has provision to mount UHF antenna.

 

 

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • MATERIAL | Hardened Steel
  • Weight 1.14Kg
  • UV rated Powder Coat

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Satin Black Number Plate Light Mounting Bracket.

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI NUMBER PLATE LIGHT MOUNTING BRACKET

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
